mapper.select:
SELECT li.id, li.label_name, li.label_describe, li.label_cover, li.follow_number, li.article_number, li.state, li.create_time, lgi.grouping_name FROM b_label_info AS li LEFT JOIN b_label_grouping_info AS lgi ON li.label_grouping_id = lgi.id
and li.state=#{bo.state}
and li.label_name like concat('%' ,#{bo.labelName},'%')
and lgi.grouping_name like concat('%' ,#{bo.groupingName},'%')

update.foreach: update b_label_info set`follow_number` = ifnull(#{item.followNumber},0), `article_number` = ifnull(#{item.articleNumber},0) where `id` = #{item.id}
